subject: Boxing
Murders and Attempted Murders
Life-Sustaining Support Systems, Withdrawal Of
lead_paragraph: The former boxing champion Hector Camacho was clinging to life after being shot in the face in Puerto Rico, with doctors and his family expected to decide whether to remove him from life support.
snippet: The former boxing champion Hector Camacho was clinging to life after being shot in the face in Puerto Rico, with doctors and his family expected to decide whether to remove him from life support.
